tasks.label: Install Python deps
tasks.command: python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

tasks.label: Install Python deps (fish)
tasks.command: python3 -m venv .venv; and . .venv/bin/activate.fish; and pip install -r requirements.txt

tasks.label: Quick import check
tasks.command:
. .venv/bin/activate.fish; and python - <<'PY'
import importlib
mods = [
    'aiohttp',
    'ccxt.async_support',
    'sqlalchemy',
    'dotenv',
    'uvloop',
]
for m in mods:
    try:
        importlib.import_module(m)
        print(f'OK {m}')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f'ERR {m}: {e}')
PY
